== Kodiyathur (627420) ==

== Geographic Location and Population ==

Kodiyathur is a village in the [[Kozhikode]] taluka of [[Kozhikode]] district with an area of 2990 hectares and harbouring 6355 households with total population of 29816 as per the 2011 Census. The nearest town [[Kozhikode]] is at a distance of 34 km. Male population is 14725 and female population is 15091. Scheduled Caste Population is 2513 and Scheduled Tribes population is 291. Census Location Code of the village is 627420<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

* Total literate population: 24383 (81.78%)
* Literate male population: 12108 (82.23%)
* Literate female population: 12275 (81.34%)
